T02D2224:70b-1: do ha ko sha g'i ti /
T02D2224:70b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2224:70b-5: dug sprul lta bu'i skal med ni //
T02D2224:70b-6: nges par skye bo dam pa la ;
T02D2224:70b-7: / skyon gyi dri mas dgod pa'i phyir //
T02D2224:70b-8: mthong ba tsam gyis 'jigs par byos //
T02D2224:70b-9: de nyid mi shes bram ze ni //
T02D2224:70b-10: gyi na rigs byed gzhi dag 'don //
T02D2224:70b-11: sa chu ku sha dag byed dang //
T02D2224:70b-12: khyim na gnas shing me la bsreg / don med sbyin sreg byed pa ni //
T02D2224:70b-13: du bas mig la gnod par bas //
T02D2224:70b-14: dbyu gu dbyug gsum legs ldan gzugs //
T02D2224:70b-15: tha dad pa dang dad pas bstan pa dang //
T02D2224:70b-16: chos dang chos min shes par mi mnyam zhing //
T02D2224:70b-17: 'gro ba rnams ni brdzun pa nyid du gol //
T02D2224:70b-18: ae ra'i thal bas lus la byugs nas su //
T02D2224:71a-2: khyim du mar me btang nas gnas //
T02D2224:71a-4: skyil krung bcas nas mig btsums te //
T02D2224:71a-5: rna bar shub shub skye bo slu bar byed //
T02D2224:71a-6: khyo med skra med 'di 'dra gzhan la ston //
T02D2224:71a-7: dbang rnams bskur zhing bla ma'i yon rnams len //
T02D2224:71a-8: sen mo ring zhing lus la dri mas g-yogs //
T02D2224:71a-9: gos dang bral zhing skra ni 'bal bar byed //
T02D2224:71a-10: nam mkha'i yid can gnod byed lam gyi gzugs //
T02D2224:71a-11: thar pa'i ched du bdag nyid 'gro byed slu //
T02D2224:71a-12: gcer bus gal te grol 'gyur na //
T02D2224:71a-13: khyi dang wa sogs cis mi grol //
T02D2224:71a-14: spu btogs pas ni grol 'gyur na //
T02D2224:71a-15: bud med spu btogs grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2224:71a-16: mjug spu bslang bas grol 'gyur na //
T02D2224:71a-17: rma bya g-yag sogs grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2224:71a-18: langs te za bas grol 'gyur na //
T02D2224:71a-19: rta dang glang po ci phyir min //
T02D2224:71a-20: mda' bsnun na re nam mkha'i yid can la //
T02D2224:71a-21: thar pa nam yang yod pa ma yin zer //
T02D2224:71a-22: bde pa'i de nyid dang ni bral gyur zhing //
T02D2224:71a-23: lus kyi dka' thub 'ba' zhig tsam ldan pas //
T02D2224:71a-24: dge tshul dge slong gnas brtan zhes bya bas //
T02D2224:71a-25: bande rnams ni de ltar rab byung nas //
T02D2224:71a-26: kha cig mdo sde 'chad par byed cing 'jug / la la ro gcig sems kyi tshul 'dzin mthong //
T02D2224:71a-27: kha cig theg chen de la rgyug byed cing //
T02D2224:71a-28: de ni gzhung lugs tshad ma'i bstan bcos yin //
T02D2224:71a-29: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ma lus bsgom //
T02D2224:71a-30: kha cig bzhi pa'i don 'chad pa la zhugs ;
T02D2224:71a-31: / la la nam mkha'i khams la rtog par snang //
T02D2224:71a-32: gzhan yang stong nyid ldan par byed pa de //
T02D2224:71a-33: phal cher mi mthun phyogs la zhugs pa yin //
T02D2224:71a-34: lhan cig skyes bral gzhan gang gis //
T02D2224:71a-35: mya ngan 'das gang sgom byed pa //
T02D2224:71a-36: de dag 'gas kyang don dam ni //
T02D2224:71a-38: gang zhig gang la mos par gyur pa des //
T02D2224:71a-39: bsam gtan gnas pas thar pa thob bam ci //
T02D2224:71a-40: mar me ci dgos lha bshos de ci dgos //
T02D2224:71a-41: de la ci bya gsang sngags bstan pa ci zhig dgos //
T02D2224:71a-42: 'bab stegs 'gro dang dka' thub mi dgos te //
T02D2224:71b-0: chu la zhugs pas thar pa thob @71b bam ci //
T02D2224:71b-1: snying rje dang bral stong pa nyid zhugs gang //
T02D2224:71b-2: des ni lam mchog rnyed pa ma yin no //
T02D2224:71b-3: 'on te snying rje 'ba' zhig bsgoms na yang //
T02D2224:71b-4: 'khor ba 'dir gnas thar pa thob mi 'gyur //
T02D2224:71b-5: gang yang gnyis po sbyor par nus pa des //
T02D2224:71b-6: 'khor par mi gnas mya ngan 'das mi gnas //
T02D2224:71b-7: kye lags gang smras brdzun zhing log pa de bor la //
T02D2224:71b-8: gang la zhen pa yod pa de yang thong //
T02D2224:71b-9: rtogs par gyur na thams cad de yin te /
T02D2224:71b-10: de la gzhan pa sus kyang shes mi 'gyur //
T02D2224:71b-11: klog pa de yin 'dzin dang sgom pa de yin te //
T02D2224:71b-12: bstan bcos snying la 'chad pa'ang de yin no //
T02D2224:71b-13: de mi mtshon pa'i lta pa yod min te //
T02D2224:71b-14: 'on kyang gcig bu bla ma'i zhal la ltos pa yin //
T02D2224:71b-15: bla ma'i smras pa gang gi snying zhugs pa //
T02D2224:71b-16: lag pa'i mthil du gnas pa'i gter mthong 'dra //
T02D2224:71b-17: gnyug ma'i rang bzhin byis bas ma mthong bar //
T02D2224:71b-18: 'khrul pas byis ba bslus zhes mda' bsnun smra //
T02D2224:71b-19: bsam gtan med cing rab tu 'byung ba med //
T02D2224:71b-20: khyim na gnas shing chung ma dag dang lhan cig tu //
T02D2224:71b-21: gang zhig yul gyi dga' bas bcings las mi grol na //
T02D2224:71b-22: mda' bsnun da ni de nyid shes pa yin zhes smra //
T02D2224:71b-23: gal te mngon du gyur na bsam gtan ci //
T02D2224:71b-24: gal te lkog tu gyur na mun pa 'jal //
T02D2224:71b-25: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin de nyid ni //
T02D2224:71b-26: dngos dang dngos po med pa ma yin te //
T02D2224:71b-27: mda' bsnun 'o dong rtag tu 'bod par byed //
T02D2224:71b-28: gang zhig blangs nas skye shi gnas gyur pa //
T02D2224:71b-29: de nyid blangs nas bde chen mchog grub ces //
T02D2224:71b-30: skad gsang mthon bos mda' bsnun smra byed kyang //
T02D2224:71b-31: byol song 'jig rten mi go ji ltar bya //
T02D2224:71b-32: bsam gtan bral bas ci zhig bsam byar yod //
T02D2224:71b-33: brjod du med gang ji ltar bshad du yod //
T02D2224:71b-34: srid pa'i phyag rgyas 'gro ba ma lus bslus //
T02D2224:71b-35: rang bzhin gnyug ma lus kyang blangs pa med //
T02D2224:71b-36: rgyud med sngags med bsam bya bsam gtan med //
T02D2224:71b-37: de kun rang yid 'khrul bar byed pa'i rgyu //
T02D2224:71b-38: rang bzhin ngag pa'i sems la bsam gtan dag gis mi bslad da //
T02D2224:71b-39: bdag gi de nyid bde la gnas shing gdung bar
T02D2224:71b-40: ma byed cig / za zhing 'thung la gnyid sprod
T02D2224:71b-41: kyis dga' zhing // rtag tu yang dang yang du 'khor lo 'gengs //
T02D2224:72a-2: rmongs pa 'jig rten mgon por rdog pas mnan nas song //
T02D2224:72a-3: gang du rlung dang sems ni mi rgyu zhing //
T02D2224:72a-4: nyi ma zla ba 'jug pa med gyur pa //
T02D2224:72a-5: mi shes pa dag gnas de dbugs phyung cig /
T02D2224:72a-6: mda' bsnun gyis ni man ngag thams cad bstan nas
T02D2224:72a-7: song // gnyis su mi bya gcig tu bya ba ste //
T02D2224:72a-8: rigs la bye brag dag tu ma 'byed par //
T02D2224:72a-9: khams gsum ma lus 'di dag thams cad ni //
T02D2224:72a-10: 'dod chags chen po gcig tu kha dog sgyur cig dang //
T02D2224:72a-11: der ni thog ma dbus mtha' med //
T02D2224:72a-12: ji srid mya ngan 'das pa min ;
T02D2224:72a-13: / bde ba chen po mchog 'di la //
T02D2224:72a-14: bdag dang gzhan du yod ma yin //
T02D2224:72a-15: mdun dang rgyab dang phyogs bcu ru //
T02D2224:72a-16: gang gang mthong ba de de nyid //
T02D2224:72a-17: de ring nyid du mgon po da ltar 'khrul pa chad //
T02D2224:72a-18: da ni su la'ang dri par mi bya'o //
T02D2224:72a-19: dbang po gang du nub gyur cing //
T02D2224:72a-20: rang gi ngo bor nyams par 'gyur //
T02D2224:72a-21: grogs dag de ni lhan cig skyed pa'i lus //
T02D2224:72a-22: bla ma'i zhal las gsal par bris //
T02D2224:72a-23: yid ni gar 'ching rlung gar dengs //
T02D2224:72a-24: sa steng 'di na yan lag gnas //
T02D2224:72a-25: de ni rmongs pas mtshams su yongs shes bya //
T02D2224:72a-26: gti mug rgya mtsho 'chad pa gang shes pa //
T02D2224:72a-27: 'di ni bde chen mchog yin te //
T02D2224:72a-28: sa ra ha yis bstan nas 'gro //
T02D2224:72a-29: kye ho 'di ni rang rig yin pa ste //
T02D2224:72a-30: yid la 'khrul pa ma byed cig / dngos dang dngos med bde par gshegs pa'i 'ching pa ste //
T02D2224:72a-31: srid dang mnyam nyid tha dad ma 'byed par //
T02D2224:72a-32: gnyug ma'i yid ni gcig tu gtod dang rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2224:72a-33: tshul chu bzhag bzhin du shes par byos //
T02D2224:72a-34: bsam gtan brdzun pas thar pa rnyed min no //
T02D2224:72a-35: sgyu lus dra bas ji ltar pang du 'khyud //
T02D2224:72a-36: bla ma dam pa'i bka' yis bde par yid ches par //
T02D2224:72a-37: nga yis brjod du yod min zhes ni mda' bsnun smra //
T02D2224:72a-38: gdod nas dag pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin la //
T02D2224:72a-39: bltas shing bltas shing mthong pa 'gag par 'gyur //
T02D2224:72a-40: de lta bu nyid dus su 'gog par 'gyur //
T02D2224:72a-41: gnyug ma nyid la skyon gyis byis pa bslus //
T02D2224:72a-42: skyo bo ma lus lhag par sun 'byin cing //
T02D2224:72b-0: nga rgyal skyon @72b gyis de nyid mtshon mi nus //
T02D2224:72b-1: 'jig rten ma lus bsam gtan gyis rmongs 'gyur //
T02D2224:72b-2: gnyug ma'i rang bzhin sus kyang mtshon du med //
T02D2224:72b-3: sems kyi rtsa ba min mtshon te //
T02D2224:72b-4: lhan cig skyes pa rnam gsum gyi //
T02D2224:72b-5: gang las de skyes gang du nub //
T02D2224:72b-6: gang du gnas 'gyur gsal bar mi shes so //
T02D2224:72b-7: rtsa ba bral pa'i de nyid gang sems pa //
T02D2224:72b-8: bla ma'i man ngag mthong pa de yis chog //
T02D2224:72b-9: khro pa'i rang bzhin sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin zhes //
T02D2224:72b-10: rmongs rnams mda' bsnun gyis smras tse ne shes par byos //
T02D2224:72b-11: gnyug ma'i rang bzhin tshig gis mi brjod kyang ;
T02D2224:72b-12: / slob dpon man ngag mig gis mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2224:72b-13: chos dang chos min mnyes nas zos pa yis //
T02D2224:72b-14: 'di la nyes pa rdul tsam yod ma lags //
T02D2224:72b-15: gnyug ma'i yid ni gang tshe sbyangs gyur pa //
T02D2224:72b-16: de tshe bla ma'i yon tan snying la 'jug par 'gyur //
T02D2224:72b-17: 'di ltar rtogs nas mda' bsnun glu len te /
T02D2224:72b-18: sngags dang rgyud rnams gcig kyang ma mthong ngo //
T02D2224:72b-19: 'gro rnams las kyis so sor bcings gyur te //
T02D2224:72b-20: las las grol na yid ni thar pa yin //
T02D2224:72b-21: rang rgyud grol na nges par gzhan med de// mchog gi mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D2224:72b-22: sems nyid gcig pu kun gyi sa bon te //
T02D2224:72b-23: gang la srid dang mya ngan 'das 'phro ba //
T02D2224:72b-24: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa yi //
T02D2224:72b-25: yid bzhin nor 'dra'i sems la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2224:72b-27: de nyid grol na the tshom med //
T02D2224:72b-29: mkhas rnams de yis myur du grol //
T02D2224:72b-30: sems ni nam mkha' 'dra bar gzung bya ste //
T02D2224:72b-31: nam mkha'i rang bzhin nyid du sems gzung bya //
T02D2224:72b-32: yid de yid ma yin par byed 'gyur na //
T02D2224:72b-33: des ni bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2224:72b-34: mkhas 'drar byas na rlung ni rnam par 'ching //
T02D2224:72b-35: mnyam nyid yongs su shes pas rab tu thim //
T02D2224:72b-36: mda' bsnun gyis smras nam zhig nus ldan na //
T02D2224:72b-37: mi rtag g-yo ba myur du spong par 'gyur //
T02D2224:72b-38: rlung dang me dang dbang chen 'gags pa na //
T02D2224:73a-0: bdud rtsi rgyu pa'i dus su rlung ni sems la 'jug / nam @73a * //
T02D2224:73a-1: zhig sbyor bzhi gnas gcig la ni zhugs pa na //
T02D2224:73a-2: bde chen mchog ni nam mkha'i khams su mi shong ngo //
T02D2224:73a-3: khyim dang khyim na de yis gtam smra yang //
T02D2224:73a-4: bde chen gnas ni yongs su shes pa med //
T02D2224:73a-5: 'gro kun bsam pas sun 'byin mda' bsnun smra //
T02D2224:73a-6: bsam gyis mi khyab grub pa 'ga' yang med //
T02D2224:73a-7: srog chags thams cad kun la yang //
T02D2224:73a-8: de nyid yod de rtogs pa med //
T02D2224:73a-9: thams cad ro mnyam rang bzhin pas //
T02D2224:73a-10: bsam pas ye shes bla med pa'o //
T02D2224:73a-11: kha sang de ring de bzhin sang dang gzhan //
T02D2224:73a-12: don rnams phun sum tshogs par skye bo 'dod //
T02D2224:73a-13: kye ho bzhin bzangs snyim pa chus bkang pa //
T02D2224:73a-14: 'dzags pa bzhin du nyams pa ma tshor ro //
T02D2224:73a-15: bya ba byed dang bya ba min byed pa //
T02D2224:73a-16: nges par rtogs na 'ching dang grol ba med //
T02D2224:73a-17: yi ge med las 'chad par yod 'dod pa //
T02D2224:73a-18: gang zhig rnal 'byor brgya la 'ga' yis mtshon //
T02D2224:73a-20: glod na grol par the tshom med //
T02D2224:73a-21: dngos po gang gi rmongs pas 'chings //
T02D2224:73a-22: mkhas rnams de yis rnam par grol //
T02D2224:73a-23: bcings pa dag ni phyogs bcur 'gro ba rtsom //
T02D2224:73a-24: mthong bar gyur na mi g-yo brtan par gnas //
T02D2224:73a-25: go bzlog rnga mo lta bur bdag gis rtogs //
T02D2224:73a-26: bu khyod rnams kyang rang la cher te ltos //
T02D2224:73a-27: kye lags dbang po ltos shig dang //
T02D2224:73a-28: 'di las ngas ni ma gtogs so //
T02D2224:73a-29: las zin pa yi skyes bu yi //
T02D2224:73a-30: drung du sems thag gcad par byos //
T02D2224:73a-31: rlung bcings pa la rang nyid ma sems skye //
T02D2224:73a-32: shing gi rnal 'byor sna rtser ma 'dug cig /
T02D2224:73a-33: ae ma'o ma yin lhan cig skyes pa mchog chags
T02D2224:73a-34: byos // srid pa'i sna rtser 'ching ba yang dag spang //
T02D2224:73a-35: 'di ni yid 'dus pa la rlung gi rlabs //
T02D2224:73a-36: g-yo zhing 'phyar la shin tu mi srun 'gyur //
T02D2224:73a-37: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin rtogs gyur na //
T02D2224:73a-38: de yis bdag nyid brten par gyur pa yin //
T02D2224:73a-39: gang tshe yid ni nye par 'gags gyur na //
T02D2224:73b-0: lus kyi 'ching ba rnam par 'chad @73b par 'gyur //
T02D2224:73b-1: gang tshe lhan cig skyes dang ro mnyam pa //
T02D2224:73b-2: de tshe dman pa'i rigs dang bram ze med //
T02D2224:73b-3: 'di ni zla ba rgya mtsho nyid dang ni //
T02D2224:73b-4: 'di ni gang+g'a'i rgya mtsho nyid dang ni //
T02D2224:73b-5: b'a r'a na s'i sra ya gha ya ti //
T02D2224:73b-6: 'di ni zla ba gsal byed nyid //
T02D2224:73b-7: zhing kun gnas dang nye ba'i gnas sogs pa //
T02D2224:73b-8: phyin te bltas pa'i rtogs pa gang smra ba //
T02D2224:73b-9: lus dang 'dra ba'i mu gnas gzhan na med //
T02D2224:73b-10: dge ba nga yis nges par yang ngag mthong //
T02D2224:73b-11: 'dab ldan padma'i sdong po ge sar gyi dbus na //
T02D2224:73b-12: shin tu phra ba'i rnal ma dri dang kha dog ldan //
T02D2224:73b-13: bye brag 'ongs shing rmongs pa mya ngan gyis //
T02D2224:73b-14: gdungs pa'i 'bras bu med par ma byed cig //
T02D2224:73b-15: gang tshe tshangs pa khyab 'jug mig gsum dang //
T02D2224:73b-16: 'jig rten ma lus thams cad gzhir gyur pa //
T02D2224:73b-17: rigs med de la mchod na las kyi yang //
T02D2224:73b-18: mtha' yi tshogs ni yang dag zad par 'gyur //
T02D2224:73b-19: kye ho bu nyon rtsod pa'i ro ni dag par yang dag gnas shes pa //
T02D2224:73b-20: 'gro ba 'chad cing 'don la sogs pas de ni shes par nus ma yin //
T02D2224:73b-21: kye ho bu nyon de nyid sna tshogs kyis //
T02D2224:73b-22: ro 'di bstan par nus pa ma yin te //
T02D2224:73b-23: bde ba'i gnas mchog rtog spangs te //
T02D2224:73b-24: 'gro ba nye par skye pa nyid bzhin no //
T02D2224:73b-25: blo ni rnam 'gags yid ni pham gyur pa //
T02D2224:73b-26: gang du mngon pa'i nga rgyal chad pa'o //
T02D2224:73b-27: de nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin mchog tu rtog pa ste //
T02D2224:73b-28: de la bsam gtan 'ching ba des ni ci byar yod //
T02D2224:73b-29: dngos por skyas pa mkha'i ltar rang bzhin na ;
T02D2224:73b-30: / dngos po rnam spangs phyi nas ci zhig skye //
T02D2224:73b-31: gdod nas skye med rang bzhin yin pa la //
T02D2224:73b-32: de ring dpal ldan bla ma bstan pas rtogs //
T02D2224:73b-33: mthong dang thos dang rig dang dran pa dang //
T02D2224:73b-34: za snom 'khyam dang 'gro dang 'dug pa dang //
T02D2224:73b-35: cal col gtam dang lan smra gyur pa la //
T02D2224:73b-36: sems so zhe na gcig gi rnam pa la mi
T02D2224:73b-37: bskyod// gang zhig bla ma'i man ngag bdud rtsi'i chu
T02D2224:73b-38: / gdung sel bsal ba ngo mas par mi 'thung
T02D2224:73b-39: par// de ni bstan bcos don mang mya ngam gyi
T02D2224:73b-40: / // thang la skom pas gdungs te 'chi bar zad //
T02D2224:73b-41: bla mas bstan pa brjod min na //
T02D2224:73b-42: slob mas go ba ma yin te /
T02D2224:74a-2: gang gis ji ltar bsten par bya //
T02D2224:74a-3: tshad mar 'dzin pa'i dbang gis su //
T02D2224:74a-4: blun pos bye brag rnyed pa ste //
T02D2224:74a-5: de tshe rdol ba'i khyim du rol //
T02D2224:74a-6: 'on kyang dri mas mi gos so //
T02D2224:74a-7: gang tshe slong na srang kha'i kham phor gyis spyod de /
T02D2224:74a-8: bdag ni rgyal po yin na slar yang ci byar yod //
T02D2224:74a-9: dbye ba rnam par spangs nas de nyid gnas pa la //
T02D2224:74a-10: rang bzhin mi g-yo btang snyoms lhun gyis grub //
T02D2224:74a-11: mya ngan 'das pa la gnas srid par mdzes //
T02D2224:74a-12: nad gzhan dag la sman gzhan gtang mi bya //
T02D2224:74a-13: bsam dang bsam bya rab tu spangs nas su //
T02D2224:74a-14: ji ltar bu chung tshul du gnas par bya //
T02D2224:74a-15: bla ma'i lung la bsgrims te rab 'bad na //
T02D2224:74a-16: lhan cig skyes pa 'byung bar the tshom med //
T02D2224:74a-17: kha dog yon tan yi ge dpe bral ba //
T02D2224:74a-18: smra ru mi btung de ni bdag gis gyin mtshon //
T02D2224:74a-19: gzhon nu ma yi bde pa snying la zhen pa bzhin //
T02D2224:74a-20: dbang phyug dam pa de ni su la bstan nus sam //
T02D2224:74a-21: dngos dang dngos med yongs su bcad pa dang //
T02D2224:74a-22: der ni 'gro ba ma lus rab tu thim par 'gyur //
T02D2224:74a-23: gang tshe yid ni mi g-yo rang gnas brtan pa ste //
T02D2224:74a-24: de tshe 'khor pa'i dngos po las ni rang grol 'gyur //
T02D2224:74a-25: gang tshe bdag gzhan yongs su shes med ni //
T02D2224:74a-26: de tshe bla med lus ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D2224:74a-27: de ltar bstan pa nyid las nges par ma 'khrul
T02D2224:74a-28: par// rang gis rang la legs par shes par byas
T02D2224:74a-29: nas ni // rdul min rdul bral ma yin sems kyang min //
T02D2224:74a-30: dngos po de dag gdod nas zhen pa med //
T02D2224:74a-31: mda' bsnun gyi smras de tsam zhig tu zad// kye
T02D2224:74a-32: ho ma lus dri med don dam shes par byos
T02D2224:74a-33: ; / khyim na gnas pa phyi rol song nas
T02D2224:74a-34: tshol// khyim bdag mthong nas khyim tshes dag la dri
T02D2224:74a-35: ; // mda' bsnun gyis smras bdag nyid shes par byos //
T02D2224:74a-36: blun pos bsam gtan bsam bya bzlas brjod min //
T02D2224:74a-37: gang tshe bla mas bstan cing thams cad shes byas kyang //
T02D2224:74a-38: bdag gis yongs su brtags pas thar pa thob bam ci //
T02D2224:74a-39: yul rnams bgrod cing gdung bas nyen byas kyang //
T02D2224:74a-40: lhan cig skyes pa mi rnyed sdig pas 'dzin //
T02D2224:74a-41: yul rnams bsten pas yul gyis mi gos so //
T02D2224:74a-42: autpala 'dab ma chu yis ma reg bzhin //
T02D2224:74b-0: gang ltar rtsa ba rnal 'byor @74b skyabs su 'gro //
T02D2224:74b-1: dug gi sngags can dug gis ga la tshugs //
T02D2224:74b-2: lha la mchod pa khri phrag byin nas kyang //
T02D2224:74b-3: bdag nyid de yis 'ching 'gyur ci zhig bya //
T02D2224:74b-5: gnyug ma'i rang bzhin ma rtogs rgal mi nus //
T02D2224:74b-6: mig ni mi 'dzums sems kyang mi 'gog dang //
T02D2224:74b-7: rlung 'gog pa ni dpal ldan bla mas rtogs //
T02D2224:74b-8: gang tshe rlung rgyud de ni mi g-yo ste //
T02D2224:74b-9: 'ching ba'i tshe na rnal 'byor pas ci bya //
T02D2224:74b-10: ji srid dbang po yul gyi grong la lhung //
T02D2224:74b-11: de srid rang nyid las med rab tu rgyas //
T02D2224:74b-12: khyed cag da ltar ci byed sam dang kye //
T02D2224:74b-13: de ni shin tu dka' ba'i dgongs pa 'jug / gang zhig gang la gnas pa ni //
T02D2224:74b-14: de ni de ru mi mthong ste //
T02D2224:74b-15: mkhas pa thams cad bstan bcos 'chad pa yis //
T02D2224:74b-16: lus la sangs rgyas yod par ma rtogs so //
T02D2224:74b-17: glang chen lo bas nas sems tshags chud pas na //
T02D2224:74b-18: der ni 'gro 'ong chad nas ngal ba ste //
T02D2224:74b-19: 'di ltar rtogs na gang du 'ang dri sa med //
T02D2224:74b-20: mkhas pa ngo cha med pas de ma rtogs //
T02D2224:74b-21: gson pa gang zhig rnam par ma gyur pa //
T02D2224:74b-22: de ni rgas shing 'chi bar 'gyur ram ci //
T02D2224:74b-23: bla mas bstan pa'i dri med blo gros ni //
T02D2224:74b-24: de nyid gter yin gzhan pa gang zhig lo //
T02D2224:74b-25: yul nyid rnam par dag ste bstan bya min //
T02D2224:74b-26: stong pa 'ba' zhig gis ni spyad par bya //
T02D2224:74b-27: ji ltar gzings las 'phur pa'i bya rog bzhin //
T02D2224:74b-28: skor zhing skor zhing slar yang de ru 'bab //
T02D2224:74b-29: thag pa nag po'i dug sbrul bzhin //
T02D2224:74b-31: grogs dag skye bo dam pa ni //
T02D2224:74b-32: yul gnyis skyon gyis bcing par 'gyur //
T02D2224:74b-33: yul la zhen pas 'ching bar ma byed cig / kye ho rmongs pa mda' bsnun gyis smras pa //
T02D2224:74b-34: nya dang phye leb glang chen bung ba dang //
T02D2224:74b-35: 'di ni ri dags bzhin du bya bar byos //
T02D2224:74b-36: gang zhig sems las rnam 'phros pa //
T02D2224:74b-37: de srid ma gon po'i rang bzhin te //
T02D2224:74b-38: chu dang rlabs dag gzhan yin nam //
T02D2224:74b-39: srid dang mnyam zhing nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2224:74b-40: gang zhig bstan te gang thos pa //
T02D2224:75a-1: yin dam par skyol ba na //
T02D2224:75a-2: nyi zer lkugs pa sa yi rdul bzhin brlag / snying ga nyid du nub par gyur pa yin //
T02D2224:75a-3: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag na //
T02D2224:75a-4: de rnyed chu ru ru mnyam 'gyur //
T02D2224:75a-5: skyon dang yon tan mnyam ldan sems //
T02D2224:75a-6: mgon po sus kyang mthong mi 'gyur //
T02D2224:75a-7: rmongs pa dag la gnyen po gang yang med //
T02D2224:75a-8: nags la mched pa'i lce bzhin //
T02D2224:75a-9: gdong du bab ba'i ltar snang ba kun //
T02D2224:75a-10: sems kyi rtsa ba stong pa nyid du lhan cig byos //
T02D2224:75a-11: gal te yid du 'ong ngam snyam pa'i sems //
T02D2224:75a-12: snying la bab pa gces par byas na ni //
T02D2224:75a-13: til gyi shun pa tsam gyi zug rdus kyang //
T02D2224:75a-14: nams kyang sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig byed par zad //
T02D2224:75a-15: de ltar yin te de ltar ma yin no //
T02D2224:75a-16: grogs po phag dang glang chen ltos //
T02D2224:75a-17: ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu'i dgos pa bzhin //
T02D2224:75a-18: 'khrul pa zhig pa'i mkhas pa ngo mtshar che //
T02D2224:75a-19: rang la rang rig bde ba chen po'i bag chags gzugs //
T02D2224:75a-20: thams cad de tshe mkha' mnyam byed par 'gyur //
T02D2224:75a-21: ka la ku ta smos su ci rung ste //
T02D2224:75a-22: rang bzhin mkha' mnyam yid kyis 'dzin pa yin //
T02D2224:75a-23: yid de yid ma yin par byed 'gyur na //
T02D2224:75a-24: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa mchog tu mdzes //
T02D2224:75a-25: khyim dang khyim na de ni brjod min te //
T02D2224:75a-26: bde chen gnas ni yongs su shes pa min //
T02D2224:75a-27: 'gro kun sems khral khur pa mda' bsnun 'dra //
T02D2224:75a-28: de ni bsam med sus kyang rtogs ma yin //
T02D2224:75a-29: bde gsang yan lag yongs su spangs pa na //
T02D2224:75a-30: bsgom dang mi sgom dbyer med bdag gis mthong//
T02D2224:75a-31: yul gyis mtshon pas gzhan dag bsam par byed //
T02D2224:75a-32: de nyid bsam pas ma rtogs rang gzhan 'gags par 'gyur //
T02D2224:75a-33: gal te sems kyis sems ni mtshon du 'gro //
T02D2224:75a-34: rnam rtog dang ni mi g-yo brtan par gnas //
T02D2224:75a-35: ji ltar lan tshva chu la thim pa ltar //
T02D2224:75a-36: de ltar sems ni rang bzhin la thim 'gyur //
T02D2224:75a-37: de tshe bdag dang gzhan ni mnyam par mthong //
T02D2224:75a-38: 'bad de bsam gtan byas pas ci byar yod //
T02D2224:75a-39: lhan cig la ni lung rnam sma lus mthong //
T02D2224:75a-40: rang gi 'dod pa mang po gsal par snang //
T02D2224:75a-41: mgon po bdag nyid gcig pu gzhan rnams 'gal //
T02D2224:75b-0: @75b khyim dang khyim grub mtha' de grub po //
T02D2224:75b-1: gcig zos pas ni thams cad tshig / phyi rol song nas khyim bdag chol //
T02D2224:75b-2: 'ongs kyang ma mthong phyin kyang med //
T02D2224:75b-3: 'dug par gyur kyang ngo ma shes //
T02D2224:75b-4: dpal rlabs med pa'i dbang phyug mchog //
T02D2224:75b-5: rnyog pa med pa'i bsam gtan 'gyur ;
T02D2224:75b-6: / chu dang mar me rang gsal gcig tu zhog //
T02D2224:75b-7: 'gro 'ong nga yis mi len mi 'dor ro //
T02D2224:75b-8: gang yang snga na med pa'i sgeg mo dang phrad nas //
T02D2224:75b-9: nyal ba'i sems ni gzhi med pa la brten //
T02D2224:75b-10: rang gi gzugs dang tha dad ma lta cig / de ltar sangs rgyas lag tu gtod pa yin ;
T02D2224:75b-11: / gang tshe lus dang ngag yid dbyer med pa //
T02D2224:75b-12: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin de tshe mdzes //
T02D2224:75b-13: khyim bdag zos nas khyim bdag mo longs spyod //
T02D2224:75b-14: yul ni gang zag mthong ste spyad par bya //
T02D2224:75b-15: nga yis rtsed mo byas pa la //
T02D2224:75b-16: bus pa rnams ni aa thang chad //
T02D2224:75b-17: aa ma bzhag nas bu de skye mi 'gyur //
T02D2224:75b-18: des ni rnal 'byor spyod pa dpe dang bral //
T02D2224:75b-19: bdag po za zhing rang bzhin mdzes //
T02D2224:75b-20: chags pa'i spyod des gang ba'i sems de nyid //
T02D2224:75b-21: chags dang chags bral spangs nas dbu mar zhugs //
T02D2224:75b-22: sems nyams pas na rnal 'byor ngas ma mthong//
T02D2224:75b-23: za zhing 'thung la bsam du med par gyur //
T02D2224:75b-24: grogs mo 'di ni sems la gang snang ba //
T02D2224:75b-25: phyi rol sems la mtshon med bdag gis 'dzin //
T02D2224:75b-26: sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor pa ni dpe dang bral pa ste //
T02D2224:75b-27: sa gsum du yang dri med mi gnas mi 'byung ste //
T02D2224:75b-28: me ni spra ba nyid la rkyen gyis 'bar ;
T02D2224:75b-29: / zla ba chu 'dzag nor bu rang dbang med //
T02D2224:75b-30: thabs kyis rgyal srid kun la dbang bsgyur pa //
T02D2224:75b-31: sems nyid de nyid grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D2224:75b-32: lhan chig skyes pa'i sdom par shes par bya //
T02D2224:75b-33: yi ge 'gro pa ma lus pa //
T02D2224:75b-34: yi ge med pa gcig kyang med //
T02D2224:75b-35: ji srid yi ge med gyur pa //
T02D2224:75b-36: de srid yi ge rab tu shes //
T02D2224:75b-37: snag tsha mnyes pas klag tu med //
T02D2224:75b-38: rag byed don med 'don pas nyams //
T02D2224:75b-39: dam pa sems dang cig shos mi shes na //
T02D2224:75b-40: gang nas shar cing gang du nub //
T02D2224:75b-41: ji ltar phyi rol de bzhi nang //
T02D2224:76a-2: lus med lus la sbas pa ste //
T02D2224:76a-3: de shes de yis grol par 'gyur //
T02D2224:76a-4: sgrub yig bzhi las dang po bdag gis ston //
T02D2224:76a-5: khu ba 'thungs pas nga ni brjed par gyur //
T02D2224:76a-6: gang gis yi ge gcig shes pa //
T02D2224:76a-7: de yis ming ni mi shes so //
T02D2224:76a-8: rkyen bral gsum ni yi ge gcig / zag med gsum gyi dbus na lha //
T02D2224:76a-9: gang zhig gsum po zag pa ni //
T02D2224:76a-10: gdol pa rig byed de bzhin no //
T02D2224:76a-11: ma lus rang bzhin mi shes pas //
T02D2224:76a-12: kun du ru yi skabs su bde chen sgrub ba ni //
T02D2224:76a-13: ji ltar sgom pas smig rgyu'i chu snyegs bzhin ;
T02D2224:76a-14: / skom nas 'chi yang nam mkha'i chu rnyed dam //
T02D2224:76a-15: rdo rje padma gnyis kyi bar gnas pa //
T02D2224:76a-16: bde ba gang gis rnam par rol pa yin //
T02D2224:76a-17: ci ste de bden nus pa med pas na //
T02D2224:76a-18: sa gsum re ba gang gis rdzogs par 'gyur //
T02D2224:76a-19: yang na thabs kyi bde ba skad cig ma ;
T02D2224:76a-20: / yang na de nyid gnyis su 'gyur ba ste /
T02D2224:76a-21: bla ma'i drin gyis slar yang ni //
T02D2224:76a-23: grogs dag zab pa dang ni rgya che ba //
T02D2224:76a-24: gzhan med bdag nyid ma yin no //
T02D2224:76a-25: lhan cig skyes dga' bzhi pa'i dus //
T02D2224:76a-26: gnyug ma nyams su myong bar shes //
T02D2224:76a-27: mun nag chen por zla ba nor bu ni //
T02D2224:76a-28: ji ltar 'char bar byed pa bzhin //
T02D2224:76a-29: mchog tu bde chen skad cig gcig la ni //
T02D2224:76a-30: bsam pa'i sdig pa ma lus phan par byed pa'o //
T02D2224:76a-31: sdug bsngal snang byed nub pa na //
T02D2224:76a-32: skar ma'i bdag po gza' dang mnyam du shar //
T02D2224:76a-33: 'di ltar gnas pas sprul par sprul //
T02D2224:76a-34: de ni dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dam pa'o //
T02D2224:76a-35: kye ho rmongs pa'i sems kyis sems la brtags na ni //
T02D2224:76a-36: lta ba ngan pa thams cad las ni rang grol 'gyur //
T02D2224:76a-37: mchog tu bde ba chen po'i dbang gis ni //
T02D2224:76a-38: de la gnas na dngos grub dam pa'o //
T02D2224:76a-39: sems kyi glang po yan du chug / de ni
T02D2224:76a-40: bdag nyid dris la gcig / nam mkha'i ri bo
T02D2224:76a-41: chu 'thung dang // de yi 'gram du zhog cig rang dga' bar //
T02D2224:76a-42: yul gyi glang po'i dbang po lag pas blangs nas su //
T02D2224:76b-0: ji ltar gsod par rang dbang @76b snang bar 'gyur //
T02D2224:76b-1: rnal 'byor ba ni glang po skyong ba bzhin //
T02D2224:76b-2: de nyid nas ni ldog par 'gyur pa yin //
T02D2224:76b-3: gang zhig 'khor ba de ni mya ngan 'das par nges //
T02D2224:76b-4: dbye ba gzhan du sems pa ma yin te //
T02D2224:76b-5: rang bzhin gcig gis dbye ba rnam par spangs //
T02D2224:76b-6: dri ma med pa nga yis rab tu rtogs ;
T02D2224:76b-7: / yid kyis de nyid dmigs dang bcas //
T02D2224:76b-8: dmigs pa stong pa nyid yin la //
T02D2224:76b-9: gnyis la skyon ni yod pa ste /
T02D2224:76b-10: rnal 'byor gang gis sgom pa min //
T02D2224:76b-11: sgom pa dmigs bcas dmigs med de //
T02D2224:76b-12: sgom dang mi sgom tha snyad med //
T02D2224:76b-13: bde pa'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2224:76b-14: rab tu bla med rang 'byung ba //
T02D2224:76b-15: bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pas shes //
T02D2224:76b-16: nags su ma 'gro khyim du ma 'dug par //
T02D2224:76b-17: gang yang de ru yid kyis yongs shes nas //
T02D2224:76b-18: ma lus rgyun du byang chub rtag par gnas //
T02D2224:76b-19: 'khor ba gang yin mya ngan 'das pa gang //
T02D2224:76b-20: yid kyi dri ma dag la lhan cig skyes pa ste //
T02D2224:76b-21: de tshe mi mthun phyogs kyis 'jug pa med //
T02D2224:76b-22: ji ltar rgya mtsho dang bar gyur pa la //
T02D2224:76b-23: chu bur chu nyid yin te de nyid thim par 'gyur //
T02D2224:76b-24: nags dang khyim na byang chub gnas pa med //
T02D2224:76b-25: de ltar byed pa yongs su shes nas su //
T02D2224:76b-26: dri ma med pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D2224:76b-27: ma lus mi rtog pa ru brten par 'os //
T02D2224:76b-28: de ni bdag yin gzhan yang de bzhin no //
T02D2224:76b-29: gang bsgom yongs su bsgom pa gang //
T02D2224:76b-30: dbye ba de nyid 'ching dang bral bar bya //
T02D2224:76b-31: 'on kyang bdag nyid rnam par grol pa'o //
T02D2224:76b-32: bdag dang gzhan du 'khrul pa ma byed dang //
T02D2224:76b-33: ma lus rgyun du gnas pa'i sangs rgyas te //
T02D2224:76b-34: sems ni ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa na //
T02D2224:76b-35: de nyid dri med mchog gi go 'phang ngo //
T02D2224:76b-36: gnyis med sems kyi sdong po dam pa ni //
T02D2224:76b-37: khams gsum ma lus kun du khyab par song //
T02D2224:76b-38: snying rje'i me tog gzhan phan 'bras bu 'dzin //
T02D2224:76b-39: ming ni mchog tu gzhan la phan pa'o //
T02D2224:76b-40: stong pa'i sdong po dam pa me tog rgyas //
T02D2224:76b-41: snying rje dam pa sna tshogs du mar ldan //
T02D2224:76b-42: lhun gyis grub pa phyi ma'i 'bras bu ste //
T02D2224:76b-43: bde ba 'di ni gzhan pa'i sems min no //
T02D2224:76b-44: stong pa'i sdong po dam pa'i snying rje min //
T02D2224:77a-0: gang la slar yang rtsa ba me tog @77a * //
T02D2224:77a-2: de la dmigs par byed pa gang yin pa //
T02D2224:77a-3: der lhung bas ni yan lag med par 'gyur //
T02D2224:77a-4: sa bon gcig la sdong po gnyis //
T02D2224:77a-5: rgyu mtshan de las 'bras bu gcig / de yang dbyer med gang sems pa //
T02D2224:77a-6: de ni 'khor dang mya ngan 'das rnams grol //
T02D2224:77a-7: gang zhig 'dod pa can gyi skye bo 'ongs pa'i tshe //
T02D2224:77a-8: de ni re ba med na gal te 'gro ba ni //
T02D2224:77a-9: phyi sgor bor ba'i kham phor blangs nas su //
T02D2224:77a-10: de bas khyim thab bor nas bsdad pa rung //
T02D2224:77a-11: gzhan la phan pa'i don ni mi byed pa //
T02D2224:77a-12: 'dod pa po la sbyin pa mi ster ba //
T02D2224:77a-13: 'di ni 'khor ba'i 'bras bu gang yin lo //
T02D2224:77a-14: de bas bdag nyid bor bar byas na rung //
T02D2224:77a-15: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal sa ra
T02D2224:77a-16: ha chen po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa do ha
T02D2224:77a-17: mdzod ces bya ba de kho na nyid rnal du
